posts.title: Fixed background
posts.body: React is a popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces. It allows developers to create reusable UI components and efficiently update the user interface based on changes in data. Next.js is a framework built on top of React that adds server-side rendering and other features, enabling developers to build fast and SEO-friendly web applications. Next.js simplifies the setup process, provides routing capabilities, and supports server-side rendering, static site generation, and hybrid rendering. It offers a great developer experience and helps optimize performance, making it a powerful tool for building modern web applications.
